name: websec-platform
description: Professional Web Security Scanning Platform - 專業網站安全掃描平台

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,SCANNER" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:scanner"
scripts.dev:scanner: cd scanner && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:scanner" "npm run start:scheduler"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:scanner
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:scanner
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:postgres:setup && npm run db:mongo:setup
scripts.db:postgres:setup: cd database && psql -h localhost -U websec_user -d websec_db -f schema.sql
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && npm run build
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:scanner
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:scanner
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && npm run security:audit:backend && npm run security:audit:frontend
scripts.backup:db: npm run backup:postgres && npm run backup:mongo
scripts.health: npm run health:backend && npm run health:scanner
scripts.generate:docs: npm run docs:api && npm run docs:frontend
scripts.docs:api: cd backend && npx swagger-jsdoc -d swagger.config.js src/routes/*.js -o docs/api.json
scripts.docs:frontend: cd frontend && npx typedoc src/ --out docs/

author: WebSecScan Team
